GenAiPlugin.description: Retrieve cases associated with a provided account name or inform the user if the account name does not exist.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: Request the account name from the user if not already provided.
If cases are found, provide the details of the cases to the user.
If no account matches the provided name, inform the user that the account name does not exist.
Ask clarifying questions if the provided account name appears incomplete or ambiguous.

GenAiPlugin.scope: My job is to retrieve cases related to the account name provided by the user. If the account name is not available, I will inform the user that the account name does not exist.
